House Bill/Resolution NO. HB09006
FULL TITLE : AN ACT MANDATING THE COMMISSION ON HIGHER EDUCATION TO INCLUDE FILIPINO AND PANITIKAN SUBJECTS IN THE TERTIARY EDUCATION CURRICULA
ABSTRACT : Seeks to ensure the development, enhancement, propagation, and preservation of Filipino and other Philippine language as a symbol of national unity and identity. Proposes that the CHED shall undertake consultations with the PRC and the Commission on Filipino Language, and other stakeholders such as the private and public school’s associations, the national student organizations, the national teacher organization, the parents-teachers’ associations and the chambers of commerce on matters affecting them.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BELARO, SALVADOR JR. B.
DATE FILED : 2019-01-31
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON HIGHER AND TECHNICAL EDUCATION ON 2019-02-04
